name: IODispatchSource
desc: The common base class for dispatch sources.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Handles the basic initialization of the dispatch source.

items.name: - free
items.desc: Performs any final cleanup for the dispatch source.

items.name: - Cancel
items.desc: Cancel all callbacks from the dispatch source.

items.name: - SetEnable
items.desc: Enables or disables the delivery of events to your code.

items.name: - SetEnableWithCompletion
items.desc: Enables or disables the dispatch source.
